title: Add your business
description: With your business's SIREN/SIRET number, we automatically retrieve the necessary information to create the account.
fallback: Don't have a SIREN/SIRET yet? Create a Personal account that you can later switch to a Business account.
search_suggestion: There are too many results, please narrow down your search.
search_not_satisfactory: Can't find your business? Add it manually
description_corporation: Using your company’s name or SIREN/SIRET (registration number), we can find the information required to set up your account.
description_association: Using the name or SIREN/SIRET (registration number) of your nonprofit, we can find the information required to set up your account.
description_administration: Using the name or SIREN/SIRET (registration number) of your organisation, we can find the information required to set up your account.
fallback_corporation: Don’t have a SIREN/SIRET (registration number) yet? Create a Private Individual account now, which you will later convert to a Business account.
fallback_association: Does your nonprofit not have a SIREN/SIRET (registration number) yet?
fallback_administration: Does your public authority not have a SIREN/SIRET (registration number) yet?
search_not_satisfactory_corporation: Can't find your company? Add it manually
search_not_satisfactory_association: Can’t find your nonprofit? Add it manually
search_not_satisfactory_administration: Can’t find your public authority? Add it manually
